TEXT.TITLE: BRAZILIAN COFFEE RAINFALL
TEXT.BODY: THE FOLLOWING RAINFALL WAS RECORDDD IN THE AREAS OVER THE PAST 24 HOURS PARANA STATE UMUARAMA 10.6 MILLIMETRES, PARANAVAI 12.2 MM, LONDRINA 6.0 MM, MARINGA 8.0 MM. SAO PAULO STATE: PRESIDENZE PRUDENTE 1.0 MM, VOTUPORANGA 26.0 MM, FRANCA NIL, CATANDUVA 0.1 MM, SAO CARLOS NIL, SAO SIMAO NIL. REUTER
